dmca.title: Webcam operator alleges copying
dmca.body:
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
1.	The copyrighted work at issue is the template and text that appears on http://www.liveporn-247-com

2.	The template and text is being copied. The following sites are basically an exact copy of my site www.liveporn-247.com. For undeniable proof, Go to the following websites. Click on "Get Free Membership". Look at the top, under "Free Registration". At the end of the paragraph, you will see my site's name "LivePorn-247". He decided to copy my site and forgot to take my site's name off. For further proof; the owner of the sites below, possesses the same ID for the counter code for statcounter.com as mine.
Search Query : adultcamchats 
Infringing Web Pages:  www.adultcamchats.com
Search Query: justfreecams
Infringing Web Pages: www.justfreecams.com

3.	[private]
[private]
Paducah, KY 42001
[private]
[private]@comcast.net
4.	[private]
[private]
Las Vegas, NV 89102
[private]
[private]@adultcamchats.com

5.	I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6.	I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that, is allegedly infringed.

7.	Signature:	Date:7-27-06

8.	[private], Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
